Confirmed. This is NOT the extended cut version of the trilogy. The first movie should run for like 3h 40m. There are absolutely no traces of the extended version footage. That is a shame.

Ripping films with AAC 5.1 is a waste. It save only very little space compared to the size of the film and only brings trouble. Most dolby receivers can NOT process AAC 5.1 so you end up with just 2 channel stereo or some simulated fake surround. If you rip 5.1 DTS IS THE WAY TO GO, if you must AC3 is fine too. But ripping to AAC is a wasted opportunity.

Excellent video quality, and as klausbaus mentioned already a DTS 5.1 would've done the trick, but I still say A:9 - but why would you completely ruin the torrent by hardcoding somewhat ugly, incomplete, eventually out of sync elvish subtitles...
